commands.name: dns-lookup
commands.title: DNS Lookup
commands.subtitle: Fast & Global DNS Check
commands.description: Check DNS propagation instantly using DoH (Google, Cloudflare, Alibaba, DNS.SB) or global propagation with worldwide DNS servers.

preferences.name: globalpingToken
preferences.title: Globalping API Key
preferences.description: Optional: Get a free API key from https://www.globalping.io/ to use Global Check feature with higher limits.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
